level1.title: Number of Islands
level1.description: Given a 2-D Array, count the number of islands in it, where land is connected in the NSEW direction

level1.title: Coin Change Problem
level1.description: Given a target of N cents and a collection of coins, how many ways can you form N cents?

level1.title: Minimum Window Substring
level1.description: Given a string and a collection of characters, find the shortest substring that contains all the characters

level1.title: Buying and Selling Stock
level1.description: Given a list of starting and ending days for a stock, maximize your profit

level1.title: Range Sum Query
level1.description: Efficiently compute the sum of the numbers between two indexes of an array

level1.title: Merge Intervals
level1.description: Given a list of intervals with a start and end value, merge the intervals

level1.title: Maximum Subarray
level1.description: Given an array, find the subarray with the maximum sum

level2.title: Range Sum Query Mutable
level2.description: Given a mutable array of integers, find the sum of elements between i and j

level2.title: Counting Inversions
level2.description: Count the number of inversions in a unsorted array

level2.title: Range Sum Query Mutable
level2.description: Given a 2-D array of characters and a list of valid words, find the number of words on the board

level2.title: Task Scheduler
level2.description: Given an array of tasks an a cooldown period, given an efficient ordering

level2.title: Non-overlapping Intervals
level2.description: Given a collection of intervals, find the number of intervals you need to remove to make the rest of the intervals non-overlapping

level2.title: Preorder Serialization Verification of a Binary Tree
level2.description: Given a particular kind of preorder serialization of a binary tree, verify that it's valid

level3.title: Find the Duplicate Number
level3.description: Find the duplicate number in an array AND use O(1) space

level3.title: Construct a Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Serialization
level3.description: Given the preorder and inorder serialization of a binary tree, construct a tree data structure

level3.title: Searching an infinitely sized list
level3.description: Given an infinitely sized sorted list (no visible end index), find a particular number

level3.title: Deocde Ways
level3.description: Given an encoding from letters to numbers, count the number of ways to decode a string of numbers

level3.title: Non-overlapping Intervals
level3.description: Given a collection of intervals, find the number of intervals you need to remove to make the rest of the intervals non-overlapping

level3.title: Jump Game II
level3.description: Given a non-negative integer array where each index represents the maxmimum you can iterate forward, minimize the number of jumps to reach the end of the array

level3.title: Find the Edit Distance Between Two Words
level3.description: Given two words, find the minimum number of edits to mutate one word into the other
